#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define LL long long
const int MAXN = 1e5 + 10;
const LL MOD = 1e9 + 7;

int tc,N;
int A[MAXN];

int main(){
    scanf("%d",&tc);
    while(tc--){
        scanf("%d",&N);
        int sum = 0;
        int swaps = 0;
        for(int i = 0;i < N;++i){
            scanf("%d",&A[i]);
            sum += A[i];
        }
        if((sum - (N * (N - 1) / 2)) % N != 0){
            swaps = -1;
        } else {
            int cur = 0;
            int M = (sum - (N * (N - 1) / 2))/ N;
            for(int i = 0;i < N;++i){
                cur += abs(M + i - A[i]);
            }
            swaps = cur/2;
        }
        printf("%d\n",swaps);
    }
    return 0;
}
